recipesJson.name: Ricola
recipesJson.author: Rubicone
recipesJson.description:
It is quite self-explanatory.
This recipe is an ADV for me.
Let it steep 1 day at least to get better results.
(You can mix it without the Spearmint flavour but with the same amount of EwM
I repeat...do not increase the eucalyptus or it will be all you will get)
Give it a try!!!
Thank you all.
